text: The Italian Figure Skating Championships () are a competition held annually to determine the national champions of Italy. Medals may be awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, ice dancing, and synchronized skating. ==Senior medalists== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !
